name: IT201_Sprint02_Josue_Benavides
description:
Sprint Project V.2 (part 2)

This is A painting Tool, on which you are able to do many thing such as:

  • Right click - to paint
  • q,w,e to change shape.
  • To change Colors and opacity use the colors Tab.
  • To change size, rotation, or randomize color and size use transform Tab.
  • To Change the time to destroy (brushes), change the environment according to current time, or make the clock continuous, or turn plane off, go to Time Tab.
